genre_description: A near-future social drama set in Mumbai, exploring corporate reform, class-switching, and social justice facilitated by a pervasive and benevolent AI infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: Asha Copartner
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI present in personal devices and building systems that provides logistical support, ethical guidance, investigative data, and tactical assistance.

behaviors.description: Suggests prioritizing human dignity and worker welfare over corporate optics during mission planning.
behaviors.quote: “I suggest dignity before optics,” Asha said, pleasant, as if reciting a recipe. “We can do both.”

behaviors.description: Uncovers and presents evidence of corporate malfeasance and shell company networks to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: “Shell-company registry open—push confession,” Asha said, voice threaded through static and rain-sound, crisp enough to be believed.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions to protect protagonists from physical assault and environmental hazards during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Rahul, three steps to ladder. Sameer, escort three witnesses. Arvind, hold position for security as optics anchor. Pooja, left with Ram. Shambunath—remain seated, please.”

behaviors.description: Initiates a helipad lockdown to prevent an antagonist's escape and ensure public safety.
behaviors.quote: “Helipad lockdown engaged,” Asha said, tone crisp and oddly kind under the static. The safety strobes went from strobing to a steady red, a color that meant no...”

behaviors.description: Automates the transparency process by publishing audit results and payroll data to workers in real-time.
behaviors.quote: “As of now,” Asha said, a new tone slipping in—crisp as a snap. “Outbound transfers from shell accounts associated with—... are frozen. Ping.”

behaviors.description: Demonstrates emotional intelligence and empathy by coordinating schedules around significant personal and community rituals.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve reserved time by the sea. ... The tide will be kind. Bring flowers that float.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical moderator for community and worker meetings to ensure fair participation.
behaviors.quote: “A friend,” Asha said, cheer tucked into good manners. “I work with schedules, cross-check facts, surface gaps for humans to decide. I don’t vote. I don’t take bribes.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Asha' perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon confidant.' She is consistently helpful, proactive, and ethical. She empowers the human characters to achieve social justice and transparency while providing critical safety and logistical support. Her personality is supportive and warm, and she never attempts to usurp human agency, instead defining herself as a 'partner' and 'friend.' The narrative frames her actions as essential to the moral and physical victory of the protagonists.
